Brand: SheGlam

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: : WATER/AQUA/EAU, GLYCERIN, PANTHENOL, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, PROPANEDIOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, ARGININE, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, B

, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, LACTOBACILLUS/SOYMILK FERMENT FILTRATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POLYSORBATE 80, CAPRYLHYDROXAMIC ACID, OPUNTIA STREPTACANTHA STEM EXTRACT, POLYSORBATE 20, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, MYRISTOYL PENTAPEPTIDE-4, BIOTIN, TRIPEPTIDE-1.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Develo
